sense.name: visual representation sketched by hand
sense.examples: The art museum acquired some early drawings by Van Gogh. The drawing on page 16 shows the major parts of a basic internal combustion engine. These preliminary drawings are studies for the new commercial shopping complex.

sense.name: principles and practice of sketching
sense.examples: Sally studied both drawing and sculpture during her year in Italy. He learned drawing from his father who was a cartoonist. They want artists who excel at drawing, not just anyone who can use a graphics art package.

sense.name: the selection of a lottery winner
sense.examples: There is a daily drawing of Super Lotto at 4 p.m. Entrants must be present at the drawing in order to win.

sense.name: fetching something from a source
sense.examples: The drawing of blood from a patient requires basic training. As the water table lowered, the drawing of water from the local wells became more difficult.

sense.name: the act of pulling a load
sense.examples: The drawing of the big carriage required a team of four horses. The drawing of his little sister up and down the hill in her wagon made Johnny tired.
